reviews.review: Cute game with a brilliant unsettling entertaining back-story - buying into it (and if you like wearing survival gear while playing) makes for a really enjoyable experience! Some medium-hard puzzling, if you're a grown-up who has played everything before it'll still surprise you. There are advanced and challenge maps if your super-survival instinct maybe rushes you through the main game too quickly (for some reason in present times it's all a little too believable...) (...except the cake)
you better play this game AND portal 2
this game is just great but its a littlebit short
old game i can play it in any time

9/10
Portal gun goes brrr...

Definitely a buy on this one. It is a pretty short game - 2hrs, considering you do not get stuck -but it is fun and enjoyable.

The challenge level is somewhat average. Can get hard sometimes tho. You can get stuck for a long time if you miss a detail needed for solving the level.

Great story, good graphics for an old spiel and amazing, inovative game mechanics.

I recommend buying Portal 2 as well but make sure you play this one first.

Not a very good story, but forces you to think. It is single player however, and the graphics are pretty good for it's time in my opinion. However, it is such an enderated game and the ending is fantastic.
Artwork in its most energetic form. 10/10

Absolutely amazing game, sadly it took me 20 years of my life to play this but i finally got around to it and i'm very happy i did.
Portal is a perfectly balanced puzzle game, not too easy, not too hard. The graphics still look good, the concept is amazing and cant really be compared to any game concepts nowadays. Plus Glados is amazing and the end credits song is great to!
cool, not as good as the sequel but still pretty nice

Eines der Besten Spiele. Ich hab es schon in meiner Kindheit gespielt. Es ist gut gealtert und vom Schwierigkeit her würd ich Mittel sagen. Ich würde es jedem empfehlen der Lust auf ein storylastiges Rätselspiel hat.

Прекрасная игра, которая с годами стала классикой. Отличный геймплей, незатянутый сюжет, прекрасная музыка, что ещё нужно для хорошей игры? Одно могу поругать - русскую озвучку, она слаба, а так прекрасная игра, которую приятно из раз в раз перепроходить.
Amazing game, best franchise ever don’t @ me

Evet, maalesef kısa bir oyun ama gayet güzel. Oyun içinde tüm duyguları yaşıyorsunuz. Hikayesi daha çok bir bulmaca oyunu olduğu için zayıf olsa da o bulmacaları çözmek insanı rahatlatıyor, zeki hissettiriyor. Bu oyunu alın, aldırın, aldırttırın ve alırken 2. oyunu ile beraber almayı unutmayın. Çünkü oyunu bitirir bitirmez hemen 2. oyuna geçmek isteyeceksiniz.
Puanım: 9/10 (hikaye zayıf ve kısaydı)

great game but sadly not much replay value

i like everything of this game its cool

As much as I love Portal 2, this game has better atmosphere. The music, the emptiness, the feeling of being really alone, it all adds up to an amazing experience. Please, play this game. You won't regret it.
Nice puzzle, a very nice concept.

This game holds a special place in my heart, being the first game I played during the pandemic, when I was discovering my love for PC gaming and all the video-game classics. I can't tell you anything you haven't already read about Portal, but I can tell you it's certainly worth a try for the $10 (I think I bought it for closer to $4 on sale). This game is still the gold standard in my eyes.
This game was amazing, I highly recommend getting this game.
Great introduction for the portal series, short, but very fun game. Everything gets so much better in the next game
when i was younger i would just sit on my dads lap and i would say "hey dad beat portal" and he would beat it in a few hours.

As my first actual bought steam game, this is a good 10 bucks spent that should've been more and the game doesn't feel the quality it was made in. 2007 felt like 2017 because of how well-made. Awesome logic game, great dialogue and music was usually from the void but some of the songs are now permanently in my playlist. Blessed game would reccommend

Fun game to play to pass the time

First off, i gotta say this is one of the best games I've ever played.

My Rating: 100/100

Story: 10/10

Gameplay: 10/10

Difficulty: The puzzles in this game are sometimes not that easy, but they are fun to solve.
(based on normal difficulty)

Graphics: 10/10
(My graphic points are based on the graphic and what year the game was released. So for example if the game is from 2010 and the graphics are good for 2010, it's a 10/10.)

Sounddesign / Music: 10/10

Duration: One Story Run:  3h - 5h

Replayability: Yes if you whait a bit

Price: Game: 8,19 (Absolutely Worth it)

Additional comments:
Creating puzzles with portals is great and in this game the idea has been implemented very well.

Wait what? It only took me 3.2 hours to complete this game?

Worth it.

Portal is the first videogame that I have ever played. I knew I had to try videogames when I realized that they could tell interesting and immersive stories in addition to being fun, and MAN, Portal did NOT disappoint! I don't think there's much I can say about Portal that hasn't already been said, so I'll just say two things: 1)Portal is FANTASTIC! and 2)The cake is a lie.
